item.title: Evidence that the shingles vaccine prevents a good chunk of dementia cases
item.description: - The shingles vaccine has been found to have a protective effect against dementia, particularly Alzheimer's disease.

item.title: Amazon Backs Out of Climate Pledge, Deletes Shipment Zero Initiative Blogpost
item.description: - Amazon has backed out of its Shipment Zero initiative, which aimed for 50% of its shipments to be net-zero carbon by 2030.

item.title: Paper Airplane Designs
item.description: - 'Paper Airplane Designs' is a website that teaches people how to make paper airplanes with easy to follow folding instructions, video tutorials and printable folding plans.

item.title: htmx
item.description: - htmx is a tool that allows users to access AJAX, CSS Transitions, WebSockets and Server Sent Events directly in HTML, making it easy to build modern user interfaces.

item.title: 0AD, an open source historical RTS in development for 22 years
item.description: - The next alpha of 0 A.D., an open-source historical RTS game, will have an experimental Vulkan graphical interface.

item.title: Layoffs push down scores on Glassdoor â€“ how companies respond
item.description: - Tech companies are asking staff to post positive reviews on Glassdoor to balance out negative ones, and they can also flag negative reviews for removal.

item.title: Tesla Model Y overtakes Corolla to be world's best-selling car in 2023
item.description: - The Tesla Model Y electric crossover has become the best-selling car in the world, selling 267,200 units in the first quarter of 2023.

item.title: Times New Bastard
item.description: - Times New Bastard is a modified version of Times New Roman where every seventh letter is sans serif.

item.title: Mozilla stops Firefox fullscreen VPN ads after user outrage
item.description: - Firefox users have been complaining about intrusive full-screen ads promoting Mozilla VPN that disable web browser functionality and cause unresponsiveness.

item.title: There oughta be a bullet time video booth
item.description: - An expert journalist created a memorable DIY video booth with a bullet time effect using an array of cameras for a wedding.
